summary: They met on the Internet. They fell in love. They drove to the desert and stopped at an abandoned warehouse. They wandered inside. Inside they found unspeakable horror. Only one of them ... See full summary »
cast: Trevor Parsons|Jillian Swanson|Michael Barbour|Danielle Petty|Jacqueline Page|Nola Roeper|Stephany Madame|Karen Dupont|Tricia B. Davis|James Littlehale|Michael Towne|Bud Watson|Rachael Devlin|Jeff Frentzen|Jack Navarone|Christian Behm
title: Diary of a Cannibal
